info.name: Hacker News Slick
info.description: Stylistic changes for Hacker News. Reduces content width for better legibility on widescreen and highlights post headers to make conversations easier to follow. Also marks the top-level comments (userscript required).
info.additionalInfo:
<dl>
<dt>2015-08-05<dd>First release.
<dt>2016-08-24<dd>Fixed comment bodies getting header style after recent site changes.
<dt>2016-10-10<dd>Better handling of comments with preformatted text and some cleanup.
<dt>2018-09-16<dd>Top-level comment marking.
<dl>
